key_metrics.name: Net Income Attributable to FUJIFILM Holdings

metadata.executive_summary: In Q1 FY2024, FUJIFILM Holdings Corporation achieved record highs in revenue, operating income, and net income attributable to the company, driven by strong sales in Imaging, Semiconductor Materials, and Medical Systems. Revenue increased by 13.4% year-over-year, reflecting robust performance across various segments despite challenges in the Healthcare sector due to one-time costs.
